isis.stitle: DT/DTI-466 A and B Series DT/DTI/DTA-466 C Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1993) - ENGINE DIAGNOSTIC TOOLS - ROBERT BOSCH SMOKE SAMPLING KIT (SE-2580) - OPERATION

svcproc.title: OPERATION
svcproc.para: In the smokemeter, a sampling pump draws off a certain amount of exhaust gas from the exhaust pipe of the respective engine and then sucks it through a filter paper disk. The filter paper disk, in turn, darkens during this process and thus gives the measure of the soot content of the exhaust gases.
Refer to Sections 5 and 6 for operation and maintenance instructions
